Name: PixelPurr
Description: PixelPurr hails from the digital forests of WebtrES, a place where the trees are circuit boards and the rivers flow with streams of code. With a body crafted from the finest forest green pixels and buttons that evoke the nostalgia of a retro console, PixelPurr is a unique blend of nature and technology. The cat screen face is a nod to its nine lives of gaming, always landing on its feet no matter the challenge. This quirky character spends days and nights reliving the glory of 8-bit adventures, offering both a comforting presence and a reminder of the simpler days of gaming to everyone in the WebtrES club.
